name: GoodMem DevContainer
postCreateCommand:
bash -lc '\
      set -e; \
      echo Running GoodMem installer (server/DB) && \
      curl -s https://get.goodmem.ai | bash -s -- --debug-install || true; \
      echo Installing GoodMem CLI via GitHub CLI && \
      sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y gh; \
      printf "%s" "$GITHUB_TOKEN" | gh auth login --hostname github.com --with-token; \
      gh release download -R PAIR-Systems-Inc/goodmem --pattern "*linux*amd64*.tar.gz" --clobber -D /tmp; \
      sudo tar -xzf /tmp/*.tar.gz -C /usr/local/bin; \
      sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/goodmem; \
      goodmem --version || true; \
      printf "OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_api_key_here\nADD_API_KEY=your_goodmem_api_key_here\n" > .env; \
      echo ".env file created - GoodMem server should be running on localhost:8080" \
    '
